Rochester.Dundee Brewing Company: Dundee is a Rochester, New York-based brewing company that produces ales and lagers. It is part of the Genesee Brewing Company, owned by North American Breweries which started marketing the brand's first lager in 1994 as J.W. Dundee's Honey Brown. Honey Brown quickly gained a good reputation and won awards, most notably the gold medal at the 2004 World Beer Cup.
